duties_responsibilities.duty: Cover multiple channels and distribute life and annuities in the Independent and Financial Institutions Channel.
Utilize extensive knowledge of the annuity space including Fixed Index, RILA, and traditional Variable Annuities.
Wholesale variable, structured, index, and fixed annuities, Life Insurance & Hybrid LTC.
Utilize excellent presentation skills and the ability to learn new products quickly.
Build and maintain extensive relationships in all covered distribution channels.
Utilize strong interpersonal, written, and verbal communication skills.

education_certification.credential: BA/BS degree in finance/marketing desired or equivalent work experience
FINRA Series 6 (and Series 63, depending on state) and State Annuity/Life Insurance licenses required
Minimum 3 years or more industry experience in Internal, Hybrid or External Wholesaling role (Annuities and Life Insurance)
